00001 #ifndef DOMSTRING_H
00002 #define DOMSTRING_H
00003 
00004 #include <string>
00005 // in 'string' the macros DOMAIN, INFINITY and OVERFLOW are defined. It
00006 // interferes with with enumeration values from mathml.h, so they are undefined.
00007 #undef DOMAIN
00008 #undef INFINITY
00009 #undef OVERFLOW
00010
